issue.title: Check that at least one diffusion property is defined
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the supplier frontend, under "my product", no verification om diffusion property is done. Implement such control to prevent a product without diffusion property being orderable should be available.

The rule would be : at least one diffusion property must be defined for any product. If not, the "orderable" option cannot be set to "True" and a red message should indicate the error (omething like "no diffusion property defined".

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Not relevant for easySDI v4
